transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning, ma'am.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ma'am, I am [Executive Name] speaking from IndiaMART. Ma'am, am I speaking to the right person?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ma'am, your name?
Customer: My name is [Customer Name].
Executive: [Customer Name] ma'am, actually, ma'am, I called you regarding your IndiaMART page. Ma'am, you have taken a silver package from IndiaMART. So, ma'am, I wanted to know if you are getting proper service from IndiaMART or not.
Customer: No, I am not getting any service. I have been calling you people for the last 15 days, but no one is picking up the call. What is this?
Executive: Ma'am, I am extremely sorry for that. Ma'am, I will definitely help you out. Ma'am, can you tell me what problem you are facing?
Customer: I am not getting any leads. I have taken the package, but I am not getting any leads. What is the point of taking the package?
Executive: Okay, ma'am, I understand. Ma'am, can you tell me when you took the package?
Customer: It has been almost a month now.
Executive: Okay, ma'am, no problem. Ma'am, I will definitely help you out. Ma'am, can you tell me what product you deal in?
Customer: I deal in ladies' suits.
Executive: Ladies' suits, okay, ma'am. Ma'am, I will definitely help you out. Ma'am, give me two minutes. I will check and let you know what the problem is.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you, ma'am. (silence) Ma'am, I have checked. Ma'am, your product is ladies' suits, right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ma'am, actually, what happened is that you have put your product in the wrong category. That's why you are not getting any leads. Ma'am, I will put your product in the right category, and you will start getting leads within 24 to 48 hours.
Customer: Okay, do it now.
Executive: Yes, ma'am, I am doing it now. Ma'am, it will take some time to update. Ma'am, you will start getting leads within 24 to 48 hours.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, is there anything else I can help you with?
Customer: No, that's it.
Executive: Okay, ma'am. Thank you for calling IndiaMART. Have a great day, ma'am.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting proper service from IndiaMART.

- Not receiving any buyleads after taking package.

- Calls not being picked up for 15 days.



Resolution:

- Product was placed in the wrong category.

- Executive is updating the product category.

- Customer will start getting leads in 24-48 hours.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product category
